app.title: Component Placement Optimization
homepage.title: Component Placement Optimization
homepage.subtitle: HERE AND NOW AI - Artificial Intelligence Research Institute
homepage.tagline: Revolutionizing PCB Design for Modern Agriculture
homepage.description: Our AI-powered platform intelligently optimizes component placement on Printed Circuit Boards (PCBs) for a wide range of agricultural electronic devices. Enhance signal integrity, manage thermal output efficiently, and significantly boost overall circuit performance through smart, automated design.
homepage.subDescription: Tailored for irrigation controllers, advanced soil sensors, comprehensive greenhouse monitoring systems, and sophisticated drone-based agri-monitoring units.
homepage.feature.autoPlacement.title: AI Auto-Placement Engine
homepage.feature.autoPlacement.descripti: Receive optimal PCB layout suggestions dynamically generated from your schematic/netlist and component list, visualized interactively.
homepage.feature.thermalSim.title: Advanced Thermal Simulation
homepage.feature.thermalSim.description: Generate visual heat maps, identify potential hotspots, and receive recommendations for component repositioning to achieve optimal thermal efficiency.
homepage.feature.signalIntegrity.title: Signal Integrity Analysis
homepage.feature.signalIntegrity.descrip: Proactively analyze and mitigate EMI, crosstalk, and impedance mismatches. Get suggestions for trace re-routing and placement adjustments.

chatbot.initialGreeting: Hello! I'm Caramel, your AI assistant for PCB optimization. How can I help you today? Try commands like 'AI auto-place components', 'optimize for thermal', or ask a question.
chatbot.voiceNotSupported: Voice recognition is not supported by your browser.

edaExport.alert: EDA Export (Simulated): This feature would generate files compatible with tools like Altium, Eagle, or KiCad. In a full version, you could select your target format here.
saveVersion.alert: Version Saved (Simulated): In a complete application, this would save the current layout, components, and design notes, allowing you to revert or compare later.

airesponse.autoPlaceSuccess: AI has suggested a new layout. Check the PCB view.
airesponse.thermalSuccess: Thermal analysis complete. Advice: {advice}. Identified hotspots: {hotspots}.
airesponse.signalIntegrityFail: Signal integrity analysis could not be performed by AI.
airesponse.powerPathFail: Power path analysis could not be performed by AI.
airesponse.placeComponentsSuccess: AI has attempted to move components. Check layout.
airesponse.placeComponentsFail: AI component placement failed. Error: {error} Details: {details}
airesponse.placeComponentsInvalidFormat: Invalid format for 'place' command. Use: 'place [comp1] near [comp2]'.
airesponse.addComponentGeneralFail: Failed to add component. Please use the controls panel or a more specific command format.
airesponse.testingSoilSensor: Testing the soil sensor now. Check the modal for results.
airesponse.soilSensorNotFound: The 'Moisture Probe' sensor is not currently on the PCB. Please add it or select a preset that includes it.
airesponse.genericFail: Sorry, I couldn't process that request.
speech.notSupported: System: Speech synthesis not supported by this browser. Cannot provide voice feedback.
